Package edu.depaul.cdm.madl.tools.ui.internal.text.functions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISourceVersionDependent
    Mix-in for any rule that changes its behavior based on the Java source version.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMadlScanner
    Initialized with a color manager and a preference store, its subclasses are only responsible for providing a list of preference keys for based on which tokens are generated and to use this tokens to define the rules controlling this scanner.
    BufferedDocumentScanner
    A buffered document scanner.
    CombinedWordRule
    An implementation of IRule capable of detecting words.
    CombinedWordRule.CharacterBuffer
    Character buffer, mutable or suitable for use as key in hash maps.
    CombinedWordRule.WordMatcher
    Word matcher, that associates matched words with tokens.
    FastMadlPartitionScanner
    This scanner recognizes doc comments, multi-line comments, single-line comments, strings, and multi-line strings, in addition to the default.
    MadlColorManager
    Madl color manager.
    MadlCommentScanner  
    MadlMultilineStringScanner
    A scanner for multi-line strings
    MadlPartitionScanner
    This scanner recognizes the Madldoc comments and Dart multi line comments.
    MadlPresentationReconciler
    Presentation reconciler, adding functionality for operation without a viewer.
    MadlWhitespaceDetector
    A java aware white space detector.
    MadlWordDetector
    A Java aware word detector.
    PreferencesAdapter
    Adapts Preferences to IPreferenceStore
    SingleTokenMadlScanner
